title: Smart Asset Receipt-Chain Checkpoint Attachment
description: Typed ArtifactRef used in transition envelopes to commit to a SmartAssetReceiptChainCheckpoint payload digest (excluding proof). This lets corridor receipts act as external anchors for an asset-local receipt-chain head without requiring a blockchain.

asset_id.description: Optional asset id for operator convenience.

mmr_root.description: Optional MMR root for operator convenience.

uri.description: Optional URI/path to the referenced checkpoint file.
